verses.name: Amos 6:12
verses.text: Shall horses run upon the rock? will one plow there with oxen? for ye have turned judgment into gall, and the fruit of righteousness into hemlock:

verses.name: Amos 6:13
verses.text: Ye which rejoice in a thing of nought, which say, Have we not taken to us horns by our own strength?

verses.name: Amos 6:14
verses.text: But, behold, I will raise up against you a nation, O house of Israel, saith the Lord the God of hosts; and they shall afflict you from the entering in of Hemath unto the river of the wilderness.
